name: Prophecy of Merlin
description:
Old King Arthur enjoyed an extravagant life, ignoring the sufferings of his people. Merlin was very disappointed. Using the magic, he made the space-time conversion and created a new world where King Arthur, Great Caesar and Emperor Charlemagne and their knights were all brought together.
Merlin predicts that the flames of war will be burning soon, and the final winner will be decided by a brave man coming from the future world...

Are you the man in Merlin's prophecy?

Knights of Round Tables Vs Rome Vs Paladins, who will win?
King Arthur, Caesar, and Charlemagne, who will you pledge loyalty to?
London, Berlin, Paris, Rome, Brussels... What they looks like in ancient times?
Vikings, Crusaders, Salah ad-Din, Mongolia cavalry... Are you ready for the adventure?


FEATURES:

1. Build your castle, marry the girl you love, get promoted and expand your land.
2. Defeat and recruit hundreds of historical heroes such as Roland, Robin Hood and Spartacus etc.
3. Learn the ancient battle strategy, killing thousands enemy by hundreds.
4. Experience historical battle and change the history by your effort.
5. Join a legion and play with players from all over the world.
6. Fight against the mad Kings in the world campaign and win the love the Helen.

WHY WE ARE SPECIAL:

1. No more pay to win!
2. No more collecting resources constantly!
3. No more building and upgrading troops endlessly!
4. No more worrying about your army been killed over one night!

Welcome to the new land! Download now and start a journey of adventure!
